author: Tomas Petrašiūnas
title: Foldable Electric Bicycle
text:
Foldable Electric Bicycle Posted Today SITGO is an electric bike that is lightweight and easy to store with 3 folding steps. It has USB charging port, which can be used to charge your cell phone, or other digital equipment. 
It also has a 360-degree rotating cell phone holder, you can riding while listen to the music or check on your navigation. 
It uses latest Japanese super mute brushless lightweight motor technology and energy-efficient power lithium battery. 
Specs Battery: 36V 8.8AH power lithium battery Motor: 180W brushless hub motor Speed: 0-25KM/H Age: not less than 16 years old Range: 35-40km Tire size: front wheel 18 inches, rear wheel 8 inches Handle features: LED battery indicator, horn, headlight control, speed control, power switch Pedals: Folding aluminum skid pedals Headlight: Dual5W lens focusing bright LED lights Taillight: Aluminum push ruby LED taillights (three lighting modes) USB charging port: 5V, 2A USB charging port Material: ABS, aerospace aluminum, high-strength steel, stainless steel Cushion: comfortable high elastic cushion Climbing angle: less than 15 degrees Brake system: power brakes + V break hub Maximum load: 120KG Charger: 110-220V Household Charger + 12V car cigarette lighter charger Charging frequency: not less than 1000 times Unfold Size:102CM(height)x98CM(Length)x80CM(Seat Height) Folding Size: 75CM(height)x64CM(width)x24CM(Thickness) Weight: 20KG 
The project campaign is on the Kickstarter and looking to raise $30,000 AUD to start mass production. Backers can get one with a pledge of $908 AUD. Shipping is estimated to start in Dec of 2015.
